name: 蕭佳芸
objective: This is an introductory course on literature. We will read fiction, poetry, and drama from a variety of authors from around the world. Though we may observe cultural particularities as we encounter them in the texts, the primary purpose of the course is to give students a formal introduction to literary analysis. Reading, writing, and active participation in class discussion are mandatory in order to pass the course. Assignments include but are not limited to a midterm exam, a presentation, and a final exam.
